comment: Proof of ~ ax-9 from Tarski's FOL=, ~ sp , ~ df-cleq and ~ ax-ext (with two extra disjoint variable conditions on ` x , z ` and ` y , z ` ). For a version without these disjoint variable conditions, see ~ bj-ax9-2 . This shows that ~ df-cleq is "too powerful". A possible definition is given by ~ bj-df-cleq . (Contributed by BJ, 24-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
